title: My account is perma-banned for no reason
body:
I have been playing 6 games this month and 4 of them were AI bots game, there's no way I can be toxic or int feeding. I played a 3v3 bots last night and when I woke up today they told me my account is prema-banned. What? 

I've been using my account since Season 1 and I spent thousands dollars I just spent 60 on SKT skin last week. 

For the love of god please give me a feedback

replies.body: No worries just yet! This account isn't perma-banned, but there was a protective suspension placed since we noticed some signs that someone else could have hacked your account. Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and pick "I need help recovering my account". You'll be back on the Rift in no time!
